summary: Gabriel Conroy and wife Greta attend an early January dinner with friends at the home of his spinster aunts, an evening which results in an epiphany for both of them.
cast: Helena Carroll|Cathleen Delany|Rachael Dowling|Kate O'Toole|Bairbre Dowling|Maria Hayden|Cormac O'Herlihy|Colm Meaney|Ingrid Craigie|Dan O'Herlihy|Anjelica Huston|Donal McCann|Sean McClory|Frank Patterson|Marie Kean|Donal Donnelly|Maria McDermottroe|Lyda Anderson|Dara Clarke|Paul Grant|Paul Carroll|Patrick Gallagher|Brendan Dillon|Redmond Gleeson|Amanda Baird
keywords: ireland|haunted by the past|dublin ireland|dinner party|1900s
title: Dublineses (Los muertos)
